name: delphi-fabric
description: node program to use Hyperledger Fabric nodejs SDK

scripts.install: cd common/nodejs; npm install; cd builder; npm install; cd -; cd formatter; npm install; cd -; cd fabric-network; npm install
scripts.nuke: rm -rf node_modules; cd common/nodejs; rm -rf node_modules; cd builder; rm -rf node_modules; cd -; cd formatter; rm -rf node_modules; cd -; cd fabric-network; rm -rf node_modules
